tool.name: assembly-stats
tool.command:
SRC=`command -v assembly-stats | xargs dirname /../opt/assembly-stats` mkdir -p $output.files_path && cp "\$SRC/../assembly-stats.html" '$output' cp "\$SRC/css/" '$output.files_path' && cp "\$SRC/js/" '$output.files_path' &&
asm2stats.minmaxgc.pl '${input_fasta}' > '${output}'
tool.help:
rjchallis-assembly-stats_ Assembly metric visualisations to facilitate rapid assessment and comparison of assembly quality.
.. _rjchallis-assembly-stats: https://github.com/rjchallis/assembly-stats
